entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pine Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
